data.text: She preserved the first formed father of the world,
And gave him power to rule all things.
But when the unrighteous went away from her in his anger,
For whose cause the earth being drowned with the flood, wisdom again preserved it,
Moreover, the nations in their wicked conspiracy being confounded,
When the ungodly perished, she delivered the righteous man,
Of whose wickedness, even to this day the waste land that smoketh is a testimony,
For regarding not wisdom,
But wisdom delivered from pain those that attended upon her.
When the righteous fled from his brotherâ€™s wrath,
In the covetousness of such as oppressed him she stood by him,
She defended him from his enemies,
When the righteous was sold, she forsook him not,
And left him not in bonds,
She delivered the righteous people and blameless seed
She entered into the soul of the servant of the Lord,
Rendered to the righteous a reward of their labors,
Brought them through the Red Sea,
But she drowned their enemies,
Therefore the righteous spoiled the ungodly,
For wisdom opened the mouth of the dumb,
